CardData.FlavorText: He never invited people into his house, if he could help it. He had very few friends and they lived a good way away; and he never invited more than a couple of these to his house at a time. â€”The Hobbit

Localization.Title: Beorn's Hospitality
Localization.Text: Choose: Restore 1 Health to each Character; or restore 4 Health to a Hero
